description: DHMH's chronic rehabilitation facilities are Deer’s Head and Western Maryland Hospital Centers. DHMH's primary goals for access to care are: improve access to care; reduce preventable hospital admissions; promote community based alternative settings; increase use of DHMH resources for those in need; and reduce disparities in access to care. The metrics of key outcomes shown in this dataset directly support these primary goals. These data are provided each month by DHMH to StateStat and DoIT.

name: DHMH Report 1 (Access to Care): Strategy G (Increase access to DHMH chronic rehabilitation facilities)
